name: The Wallslider
description:
The Wallslider A game by Dominic Freeston
With music by Ouch, Fire!

Available on Android and iOS

Now free in your (desktop) browser!

How to play:

The Wallslider is a one-button game: Tap either your mouse/trackpad button or the space bar to play.

Notes:

Limitations that Safari imposes on embeds seems to mean your progress won't be saved across sessions, so if you're on Mac I'd recommend you use another browser (like Firefox). The game doesn't support mobile browsers particularly well, but if you'd like to play it on the go it is available to buy on Android and iOS (links below).
